question: True or False: Fingers should be kept clear of the blade when cutting using a knife

answers.on_selected: Yes, don't cut your fingers off!
Keep your fingers away from the knife if you want to keep them!

question: You are frying some chicken and step away from the kitchen to answer a call. When you return, the pan has caught fire. Which item would be appropriate to use to extinguish the fire?

answers.on_selected: This will put out the fire, just make sure to turn off the burner afterwards
The water will sink below the oil and boil, throwing burning oil into the air.
Flour is flammable, it will not smother the fire
A type ABC fire extinguisher is not recommended for an oil fire. While it won't make it significantly worse, it may not put it out either
Type K, for Kitchen, is another good choice and will put out the fire effectively
